alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craig, northwestern Delaware, southwestern Ottawa and central Mayes Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Sportsmen Acres Community, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Grove... Locust Grove... Salina... Afton... Langley... Adair... Bernice... Ketchum... Spavinaw... Disney... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Honey Creek State Park... Cherokee State Park... Bernice State Park... Cleora... Chloeta... Spavinaw State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 286 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
